title: Sketchbook Folio, "Pope Gregorio VII and Four Angels, Study after Raphael "Persons of the Papacy"; Antique Bench", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: Roma Rafaello; at lower left: Roma/ sedile greco; at lower left corner: 28. On verso: 1 nero geme d'oro/ 2 celeste/ 3 giallo ricamoto rosso/ 4 celeste/ 5 color di rosa/ rabeschi cinabro/ 6 celeste/ 7 nero testa a canestro colorito/ 8 galo canne (?)/ 9 bianco ornati colori/ 9; other numbers annotated throughout design.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of seated Pope Gregorio VII, holding book, about to write, or probably copy from another book, at which he looks. Four angels aid him, one holds inkpot, two support book, and one turns page. Lower drawing of marble bench with lion's paw feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Pope Gregorio VII and Four Angels, Study after Raphael "Persons of the Papacy"; Antique Bench", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3497.
